sourcesContent:
<form name="myForm" *ngIf="cv" [formGroup]="cvForm" (ngSubmit)="Submit()" class="dimention" 
style="margin-top: 100px; margin-bottom: 100px">
<mat-card>

<mat-form-field>
<input matInput placeholder="Prenom" required  [(ngModel)]="cv.prenom" name="prenom"
                   #prenom="ngModel">/>
<!-- <mat-error *ngIf="cvForm.get('prenom')?.hasError('required')">Le prenom est requis</mat-error> -->

</mat-form-field>

<mat-form-field>

<input matInput placeholder="Nom" required  [(ngModel)]="pokemon.name" name="nom"
#nom="ngModel"> />
<!-- <mat-error *ngIf="cvForm.get('nom')?.hasError('required')">Le nom est requis</mat-error> -->
</mat-form-field>

</mat-card>

<button
mat-raised-button style="background-color: #e6e0ed; color: #020005" type="submit">
Enregistrer et Contunier
</button>
</form>
<!-- [disabled]="cvForm.invalid" -->
